name: seller_delivery_of_hoa_documents_days
title: Within how many days after Acceptance must payment for ordered HOA documents be made?
label: HOA Docs Days
description: This will only apply if the Property is subject to a Homeowners Association (HOA).
tips: This is initiated by the seller who pays the fees upfront. This ensures timely receipt of HOA documents for review.
small_print: Delayed payment for HOA documents may impact document delivery and review timelines.

internal.notes: Days to pay for HOA documents

seller_delivery_of_hoa_documents_days.name: seller_delivery_of_hoa_documents_days

suggested.hint: Anything greater than 3 days is not recommended.
